evidence.claim: Patient Experience Institute's commitment to healthcare standards includes FHIR, promoting interoperability.
The Patient Experience Institute adheres to HIPAA guidelines to ensure patient data privacy and security.
Their platform may utilize various APIs and tools compliant with health data standards, but specific APIs were not detailed publicly.
Patient Experience Institute emphasizes integration with EHR systems in their resources for enhancing patient experience statistics.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse activities found on their site.
